metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16688 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Dolibarr 9.0.5 has stored XSS in an Email Template section tomails_templates.php. A user with no privileges can inject script to attackthe admin. (This stored XSS can affect all types of user privilege fromAdmin to users with no permissions.)

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
